title: Tom Brady to FOX; Can the Giants compete? Christmas games; Sam Prince
itunes:title: Tom Brady to FOX; Can the Giants compete? Christmas games; Sam Prince
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins analyzing if it’s “go time or not” for the New York Giants.  Hosts Kay Adams, Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt, and former Super Bowl champion Shaun O’Hara examine where the New York Giants stack up against the rest of the NFC East. Then the GMFB crew gets into their “taco bout it” segment and Peter talks about the Eagles front office tree, Shaun gets into Nick Chubb’s 675-pound squat, and Kyle takes a look at how people think when the NFL schedule gets released. Later, they react to Tom Brady’s announcement that he’ll be joining FOX and they finish up being joined by Sam Prince who announced the New York Giants #5 overall pick and he talks about the draft experience, meeting Eli Manning, and then he gives his play-by-play call for the famous David Tyree catch.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
